channel.title: ::pure/::master command? 1 per User?
channel.description: Okay, so in my classic PK server, I'm making it to where you can choose ::pure, ::zerker, etc. It will also give items, how do I make it to where you can only use it once? >.> So they can't keep typing ::pure, and getting more items.

item.title: ::pure/::master command? 1 per User?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

if(playercommand.startsWith("pure") { c.starter = 2; for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } else if (c.starter == 2) || (c.starter == 3)) { c.sendMessage("You already used this command!"); }

if(playercommand.startsWith("zerker") { c.starter = 3; c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.sendMessage("You have chosen to be a Zerker."); } else if (c.starter == 3) { c.sendMessage("You already used this command!"); }

your gonna have to change the amount of xp the player gets to make it 45 on zerker. btw. this is an atrocious way of doing this code.

Read full topic

item.title: ::pure/::master command? 1 per User?
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

[quote=“jaruanna, post:9, topic:430793”]if(command.startsWith("pure") { starter = 2; for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } else if (starter == 2) || (starter == 3)) { sM("You already used this command!"); }

if(command.startsWith("zerker") { starter = 3; addSkillXP(1210422, 0); addSkillXP(63100, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); sM("You have chosen to be a Zerker."); } else if (starter == 3) { sM("You already used this command!"); }

this should work. keep in mind its for a 317 delta. i see it says 600 development in your sig.
and may i ask, what is zerker?[/quote]
45 defence. :S
But, I have PI not Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: ::pure/::master command? 1 per User?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“dylan.hurley, post:4, topic:430793”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=533469.msg3899859#msg3899859 date=1327656374]
If a player has typed that command before (check their save file), say no. Else, give the player the items and save a variable in their character file (saying that they have done the command).
[/quote]
That makes no sence?[/quote]

dylan.hurley:

Make all commands in to a if statement and crate a bulletin or sumthing that true false thing in playersave.java and player.java done

Are you high.
